name: Mr Incredible Bulk [Trijam 157]
description:
I considered not putting this game in. There are so many broken parts, The core anger mechanic is broken, It does not respond in a way that I had envisioned. I going to leave this game out here for a week before removing it. I would really like feedback on the parts that you liked. 

Thanks all for taking the time to view the game.

PS I may through in a few sneaky updates, fix some smaller bugs.
